00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // We have to declare the global new([])/delete([]) operators before declaring 
00097 // the Ogre::MemoryManager class since it lists them as friend functions
00098 void *operator new(size_t reportedSize);
00099 void *operator new[](size_t reportedSize);
00100 void operator delete(void *reportedAddress);
00101 void operator delete[](void *reportedAddress);

00116     {

00118         size_t reportedSize;

00334 
00341 static unsigned gProcessID = 0;
00342 
00343 // When compiling in Visual C++ (occuring in VS2005 Express but not for VC 7.1) with
00344 // managed C++, should put the new([])/delete([]) overrides inside unmanaged context,
00345 // otherwise Visual C++ will link with overridden version of new([]) and CRT version
00346 // of delete([]), thus, mess up both of OGRE memory manager and CRT memory manager.
00347 #if defined(__cplusplus_cli)
00348 #pragma managed(push, off)
00349 #endif
00350 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00351 // Overridden global new([])/delete([]) functions
00352 //
00353 inline void *operator new(size_t reportedSize)
00354 {
00355     if( !gProcessID )
00356         gProcessID = Ogre::MemoryManager::instance()._getProcessID();
00357     return Ogre::MemoryManager::instance().op_new_sc( reportedSize, gProcessID );
00358 }
00359 inline void *operator new[](size_t reportedSize)
00360 {
00361     if( !gProcessID )
00362         gProcessID = Ogre::MemoryManager::instance()._getProcessID();
00363     return Ogre::MemoryManager::instance().op_new_vc( reportedSize, gProcessID );
00364 }
00365 
00366 inline void operator delete(void *reportedAddress)
00367 {
00368     Ogre::MemoryManager::instance().op_del_sc( reportedAddress, gProcessID );    
00369 }
00370 inline void operator delete[](void *reportedAddress)
00371 {
00372     Ogre::MemoryManager::instance().op_del_vc( reportedAddress, gProcessID );
00373 }
00374 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00375 #if defined(__cplusplus_cli)
00376 #pragma managed(pop)
00377 #endif
00378
